about_the_game:
Customise your monsters with this pack in association with Steve Spohn. Half of the proceeds of this pack go to The Able Gamers Charity.

Steve is the COO of The AbleGamers Charity Foundation, an American nonprofit organisation dedicated to improving accessibility in the video game industry. He is an absolute champion for this community and they do incredible work assisting people with disabilities to play video games. Also, Steve has his own Twitch channel (SteveInSpawn) where he has been a great advocate for Monster Racing League. Steve also loves phoenix themed stuff.

This pack includes:
  • 2 premium helmets
  • 2 premium armour sets
  • 1 premium colourway
  • 1 premium mouthware
  • 1 premium set of horns
  • 1 premium set of ears
  • 1 premium sticker
